alert.note: Alert for McDuffie (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 6:27PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of McDuffie County through 700 PM EDT... At 627 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Camak, or 7 miles north of Warrenton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thomson, Thomson-McDuffie County Airport, Wrightsboro, Dearing, Sweetwater Park, Arties Pond Public Fishing Area, McDuffie County Fire Department, Adamsville, Thomson Fire Department, McDuffie Regional Medical Center, University Hospital McDuffie, White Oak Campground, Boneville and Ansley Mill. This includes Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 167 and 178. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
